Summary: The hotel has had a makeover. From the outside you might be afraid to walk in, but is actually is a nice room. Large,roomy and clean. The people at the front desk are very nice. The only complaints are, only 2 bath towels in the room and that there was no shampoo!?!? I have never stay in any motel/hotel that did not get shampoo. LOL. The area is pretty nice. I felt safe and secure. The bed was comfortable and they have a lot of channels on the TV. The price was right for a busy weekend compared to the other hotels in the area.

This place was excellent it has the affordability of Motel 6 but more room to move around,equipped with a full sized kitchen no baby fridge here  with all the attributes of a small apartment...this is a family friendly place and the staff gets 5 starsðŸ’¯   take a bow you guys are the best.
Manager Response: Dear Felebe,  We appreciate you recognizing our excellent team members and our property.  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, please come again soon. We hope to see you again soon. Safe Travels.

Summary: My relatives from England came for my brothers wedding and instead had $100 worth of their souvenirs stolen by the motel staff while they were at said wedding. Do NOT stay at this horrible, bug ridden joke of a motel. The manager refused to help. Police were called.

Summary Heading: Modern rooms for the most part but severe parking issues
Summary: Stayed here 5 nights with my wife and a friend while visiting Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm.  Let's start with the room. The rooms at this motel have the new modern Motel 6 look with the green/gray colors and faux wood floors. The first room we were given had a bad lock on the door that wouldnt work and the second latch lock was missing. Luckily, I asked if there was another room available and was able to move. This room had a working lock and latch. The room itself was clean. Drapes had some holes in them, and it appears someone had broke the lock on the bathroom door at some point. The door was pretty beat up and the metal cover was missing from the lock. Not a big deal though. I am assuming this room was vacant for a while as there was a daddy long legs spider living in
Room tip: Don't get here late during the busy season or you wont be able to park.

Summary: Studio 6 is a great hotel...the reviews do not reveal the great interiors of the facility. The rooms are clean, comfy and cozy. The beds will take you to dreamland like magic. I slept very well and in some cases over relaxed. I got a lot of work done with the free wifi service and managed to get in some tv time also. The housekeeping staff is very courteous and will keep you stocked with towels, soap and whatever necessities you need. Ask for Rosalinda. She is quite a peach and does her job to perfection. The housekeeping staff will check on you everyday to tidy up your room and restock it. This is probably the first hotel i have felt okay with to walk around on the laminated wood floors barefoot. Another benefit of this area everyone fails to mention is that the food trucks
Room tip: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and the hard work the employees put into maintaining...

Summary: We found this on a holiday weekend. We were surprised at the price and availability for the holiday. Staff was very helpful and room was very nice. Loved the location and didn't realize we had a kitchenette until we entered the room. It was very crowded due to the holiday weekend so parking was not good at all. Otherwise it was a great room with good service. Will stay again soon.

I really enjoyed my stay here...very clean and spacious...constant presence of staff and they are all so friendly and accommodating...here on business or pleasure...this can be your home away from home...thank you Studio 6!

I read the other reviews before booking, and have to agree - the exterior appearance of the Studio 6 is "tired".  But the other reviews were also correct - my one-king room was clean, orderly, and comfortable.  And i mean CLEAN: the sleeping/table area, the bathroom, and the kitchen were all orderly and spotless.  The platform-type bed was comfortable.  The furniture looked new, the cable TV had channels galore.  Although I only stayed one night/left early in the AM, and only used the refrigerator (5-foot size), the kitchenette was well stocked.  I would have had no trouble fixing breakfast or lunch.  And the bathroom was better tended then many more upscale places I have stayed.  The room was quiet - no neighbor noises (next door was occupied), maybe a little traffic noise

Seems like everyone was having room key problems that night including me. After the front desk fixed the issue everything was great. Clean room and bathroom. Great stay!! Only down side i saw was the lack of parking spaces for the guests. I will stay there again!!

First, the good - recently updated rooms with a mini kitchen, and the convenient location made a good home base for our stay in the LA area.  The bad - as other reviewers here and elsewhere on the web have pointed out, there are far too many inconsiderate people hanging around in the parking lot and outside the rooms at all hours of the night, slamming doors, laughing, yelling, and loud talking like it's the middle of the day, setting off fireworks, drinking, and who knows what else.There seems to be many long term residents who treat the common area like its their own front yard, including dragging furniture out of the rooms to sit around outside at night, hang out, and call down at each other from the balcony walkway. Our neighbors were right outside our door every night, loud
Manager Response: Dear Jso R,  Thank you for your Review of our property it is much appreciated. We have addressed the issue of Noise by other guest by imposing a  Curfew @ 10pm Daly. We also enforce it. We also do not allow guest to  bring in or take furniture out onto the common area.We do have Designated  Smoking Area that guests may utilize to help minimize the noise level. We do appreciated your review & we invite you to book our property in the future.  J.Guerrero Manager

Summary: Clean, comfy. I loved that the pillows weren't like balloons, they were a bit broken in and oh soo cozy. The beds and blankets were very clean, I didn't need to use my own linens. The towels were clean and new. Great kitchenette and restroom. The shower can double as an exfoliator, it felt great after a day at the beach.  The only thing that bothered me was that there are so many people in the parking lot and hanging around at night. There were also loud music and laughter at 3am. It was still better than the neighboring hotel
Manager Response: Dear Vcastlara,  Thank you for your Kind review. I have share it with our entire staff. We look forward to your next booking.  J.Guerrero Manager

Summary: Got rooms with kitchenette for 60 bucks a night. That's a good deal. Check in was long as there were too many things the manager has to "let us know". Would recommend the place to anyone who is looking for things like stove top and puts and pans in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Shreyk21,  Thank you for your review. We do strive to offer the Best Customer Service for all our guest. I will share your review with our staff.  We look forward to your return to our property.  Sincerely, J.Guerrero

Summary: i know when you book at a Motel 6/Studio 6 you don't expect much. That's what happened. As soon as we pulled in to the motel, my wife got nervous because the outside of the building was outdated and dirty. The complex was empty which was okay. Check-in was easy and quick.  When we walked into our room we were amazed. It was nice, The room was perfect for what we needed. it looked just like the photos. except the room never cooled down comfortably because there is a floor A/C unit. The bed sucks!! didn't get a good nights rest the whole time. we didn't use the kitchen part. The bathroom was okay the towel rack fell off the first day and the maid just left it on the ground. There was molding and light-switch covers missing. I was asked at check-in if we wanted Housekeeping

Summary Heading: Awesome place for a place to crash while at Disney/Knotts
Summary: this place is very clean and well kept inside, there's a full kitchen with cooking utensils available. The only downside were the people that came out at night to hang out in the parking lots, but hotel employees make them leave after 9:30 if you're here just for a place to crash for a few days its perfect, especially if you're gonna go to knotts or disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Gennesis V,  Thank you for your kind review. We strive to offer the Best Customer Service for all our guests.  I will share your review with our staff. We look forward to your return to our property.   Sincerely, J.Guerrero

Summary: Checked into Studio 6 Cypress, Ca. and it is amazing... Modern, full kitchen, terrific staff... Victoria and John, the manager, go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and welcome... better than any place .... the amenities are great .... would stay here anytime..... great job, Victoria and John.
Manager Response: Dear kk41192,  Thank you for your Review. We Strive to offer the Best Customer Service for all our guests. I will share your review with the staff.   Sincerely  J. Guerrero
